Female, White-alone, Across all U.S. States + Puerto Rico (Status: Cleaned)

```{r}
## Separating data for Female, White-alone, Across all U.S. States + Puerto Rico (Status: Cleaned) 

library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)

acs_data <- read_excel("dataset/acsfinale.xlsx")

# Alabama
alabama_data <- filter(acs_data, Label == "Bachelor's degree or higher*")
bdh_whitealone_alabama <- tibble(
  Years = alabama_data$Years,
  Percentage_women = alabama_data$`Alabama...13`,
  Race = "White Alone"
)

# Alaska
alaska_data <- filter(acs_data, Label == "Bachelor's degree or higher*")
```
